translations.translation: This option will allow you to install a Windows-type OS on your VPS.
An error occurred when retrieving the prices.
The order number {1} has been registered.
Error when creating the order confirmation.
A new tab will open and you will be automatically redirected to the payment interface.
An error occurred on rebooting your VPS
An error occurred on rebooting your VPS
The SLA monitoring has been modified
An error occurred on modifying the SLA monitoring.
A new password has been generated.
An error occurred on resetting the password.
A VPS snapshot of {0} was successfully created.
An error occurred on creating a snapshot.
An error occurred on deleting the snapshot
An error occurred on reinstalling your VPS
The snapshot has been restored successfully
An error occurred on restoring the snapshot
An error occurred on restoring the backup
An error occurred on unmounting the backup
There is a task in error in progress. Some features will be unavailable until it is resolved. Please wait a few moments.
The HTTP service has been enabled
The HTTP service has been disabled
The HTTPS service has been enabled
The HTTPS service has been disabled
The DNS service has been enabled
The DNS service has been disabled
The SMTP service has been enabled
The SMTP service has been disabled
The SSH service has been enabled
The SSH service has been disabled
An error occurred while the information was loading.
An error occurred on loading the monitoring information.
To make sure our monitoring tools are effective, please authorise the following IP ranges on your firewall.
The request to enable the SLA monitoring has been registered.
An error occurred when requesting to enable the SLA monitoring.
The request to disable the SLA monitoring has been registered.
An error occurred when requesting to disable the SLA monitoring.
To renew your VPS {0}, you must use the OVH renewal interface (outside of the Control Panel).
Click on the "Order" button to renew your VPS now.
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH renewal interface.
Please note that a period of approximately 2 hours from your payment being accepted will be necessary for the renewal to take effect in the Web Control Panel.
Are you sure you want to reset the {0} VPS password?
Once you confirm your request, your server will immediately reboot in "Rescue" mode. Downtime due to the reboot: about two minutes.
Please note: You will receive temporary credentials, but you will need to reset the password yourself. Follow the guide.
A new password will be automatically generated and sent to {0}.
An error occurred on requesting to reset the password.
You need to reset the password by yourself. Follow the guide.
Do you really want to restart VPS {0}?
If you confirm your request, your server will reboot immediately.
We recommend that you install VMware Tools.
Attention: If you reboot and VMware Tools has not been installed, a hard reboot of your VPS will be required.
If you select this option, you will be sent an email containing the information required to log in to your VPS.
Downtime due to reboot: approximately 2 minutes.
The VPS {0} will reboot (estimated time 2 minutes)
The request to reboot has been registered.
An error occurred on requesting to reboot.
Some actions are not available in rescue mode. To restore functions, you must restore the local boot by clicking "Restart your VPS".
This action is not available in rescue mode.
Your instance is now linked to a free IPv6 in addition to the default IPv4.
Reboot my VPS in rescue mode
Do you really want to reboot the VPS {0} in rescue mode?
If you confirm your request, you server will go into rescue mode and will reboot immediately. You will then receive an email containg the information required to log in to your VPS.
Caution, once your VPS has rebooted in rescue mode, it will remain enabled until your VPS reboots normally again.
Downtime due to reboot: approximately 3 minutes.
The VPS {0} will reboot in rescue mode (estimated time 3 minutes).
The request to reboot in rescue mode has been registered.
An error occurred on requesting to reboot.
Select the IP to be configured:
Do you really want to modify the Reverse DNS of the VPS {0}?
Modifications are applied immediately, however, please bear in mind the delay required for them to fully take effect (approximately 24 hrs).
The Reverse DNS of the VPS {0} has been modified.
An error occurred on modifying the Reverse DNS.
Reverse DNS is the opposite of a traditional DNS record: it associates a domain name to an IP address.
Reverse DNS is particularly useful if your VPS is used as a private mail server, as many mail servers are configured to reject messages from IP addresses that do not include Reverse DNS.
By defining the Reverse DNS, your reduce the chances of your email being marked as spam.
Select the software to be presintalled:
You do not have an SSH key. Your authentication codes will be emailed to you.
Add a key in the My account section
Press Ctrl then click on a key to deselect it.
I wish to receive my VPS authentication codes by email.
An error occurred on loading your SSH keys.
Do you really want to reinstall your VPS {0} with the following settings?
Warning: reinstallation will cause all your data to be lost!
If you want a Windows operating system, consider selecting this option.
An error occurred on requesting the reinstallation.
Do you really want to delete the snapshot of the VPS {0}?
The snapshot on the VPS {0} will be deleted.
An error occurred on requesting to delete the snapshot.
You are about to take a snapshot of the VPS {0}.
Description to attach to the snapshot:
Do you want to take a snapshot of {0} VPS?
You are about to take a snapshot. You will not be able to access your VPS while this is happening and all previous snapshots will be lost.
A snapshot of the {0} VPS will be created.
An error occurred on requesting to take a snapshot.
Do you want to restore the snapshot dating back to {0} on VPS {1}?
Warning: this action will cause the current version of your VPS to be deleted and it will be restored to the status of the last snapshot taken. This action is permanent.
The snapshot will be restored on the {0} VPS.
An error occurred on requesting to restore the snapshot.
For the first payment, you will be invoiced pro rata for the number of days remaining from your VPS renewal date.
This option will be charged at the monthly price of {0} ex. VAT
The snapshot option enables you to create a restoration point. It records the configuration at that point, which can be restored if necessary.
Please click "Next" to continue to enable the snapshot option.
Activation of the snapshot option on the {0} VPS
To confirm your order, please proceed to payment by clicking the "Order" button below.
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
Please note that a period of approximately 2 hours from your payment being accepted will be necessary for activation of the option to take effect in the Web Control Panel.
The snapshot will be enabled on the {0} VPS.
An error occurred when enabling the snapshot.
Do you really want to activate the Backup storage option on the {0} VPS?
This option will be charged at the monthly price of {0} ex. VAT
For the first payment, you will be invoiced pro rata for the number of days remaining from your VPS renewal date.
The Backup storage is an archiving space for transferring your content, data, settings and configurations.
Click "Next" to activate the Backup storage option.
Activation of Backup storage option on the {0} VPS
To confirm your order, please proceed to payment by clicking the "Order" button below.
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
Please note that a period of approximately 2 hours from your payment being accepted will be necessary for activation of the option to take effect in the Web Control Panel.
The Backup storage option will be activated on the {0} VPS.
An error occurred on activating the Backup storage option.
The option will be cancelled on the renewal date, {0}.
This action is irreversible and cannot be cancelled.
An error occurred when cancelling the option.
An error occurred on loading the monitoring information.
Please select the VPS model you want to upgrade to.
Switching to a new model is totally free of charge. The price shown is the monthly tariff for each model. For your information, your current monthly pricing is {0}
Warning! You cannot downgrade your VPS: it is only possible to upgrade.
Price until {0}, date of the next renewal of your server:
You will then be charged {0} Ex. VAT/month for your server.
To confirm your order, please proceed to payment by clicking the "Order" button below.
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
Please note that a period of approximately 2 hours from your payment being accepted will be necessary for the upgrade to take effect in the Web Control Panel.
A reboot will be necessary before your VPS can be upgraded.
An error occurred on requesting to upgrade your VPS.
Add a domain to the secondary DNS
You are about to add a domain to the secondary DNS {0}.
Do you want to add the domain {0} to the secondary DNS {1}?
An error occurred when requesting to add a domain to the secondary DNS.
The {0} domain will be added to the secondary DNS.
Delete a domain from the secondary DNS
Do you want to delete the {0} domain from the secondary DNS?
An error occurred when requesting to delete the {0} domain from the secondary DNS.
The domain will be deleted from the secondary DNS.

Warning: numbers can only be entered using the number keypad of your keyboard. If you access this interface using a laptop that without a number keypad, you can probably access a secondary keypad via a keyboard shortcut (usually "fn + ...").
An error occurred on opening the KVM.
An error occurred on loading the information.
For the first payment, you will be invoiced pro rata for the number of days remaining from your VPS renewal date.
You will then be charged {0} per month for the service
Order the Automated backup options on the {0} VPS?
To confirm your request, please accept the terms and conditions and click "Next" below.
I confirm having read and understood the following:
To confirm your order please click the "Pay" button below.
Please note that a period of approximately 2 hours from your payment being accepted will be necessary for activation of the option to take effect in the Web Control Panel.
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
An error occurred on requesting to sign up to the Automated backup option.
Do you want to unmount the following backup on your {0} VPS?
An error occurred on unmounting the backup on your VPS.
The backup will be unmounted on your VPS.
Do you really want to mount this backup on the {0} VPS?
This backup will then be accessible via an NFS or SMB mount point.
The request to mount the backup has been registered. You will be notified by email once the mounting is complete.
An error occurred on requesting to mount the backup on your VPS.
Do you really want to reinstall your {0} VPS using the following backup?
Modify the root password on restoration
Unable to reset your VPS password while VMware Tools is not installed. However, you can reset it via rescue mode.
Warning! Restoring your VPS will delete all your current data.
The backup restore could take a few hours depending on the size of the disk.
If you want to carry out a restoration, you have to dismount your current backup beforehand.
If you want to mount backup, you have to dismount your current backup beforehand.
The request to restore the VPS has been registered. You will be notified by email once the restore is complete.
An error occurred on requesting to restore the backup on your VPS.
The additional IP addresses are only available on the VPS Cloud range.
The backup options are only available on the VPS Cloud range.
The additional IP addresses are not available for this range.
The backup options are not available for this range.
You have reached your quota of IP addresses so you cannot add any more.
You don't have any domains configured on a secondary DNS.
Automated backup is only available on the VPS Cloud range.
The automatic backup options are not available for this range.
You haven't subscribed to the Automated backup option.
You can't sign up because your NIC handle is not authorised to place orders for this VPS.
You don't currently have any restore points mounted.

A re-installation or restoration of the VPS is on-going.
Restore and mounting actions are not possible during this time.
Here is the information on the restore point currently mounted:
You don't have any restore points.
Return my VPS to this restore point
Backup storage is only available on the VPS Cloud range.
You have not subscribed to the Backup storage option.
You can't sign up because your NIC handle is not authorised to place orders for this VPS.
A new password will be sent to the admin NIC of the server.
A new password will be sent to the server admin NIC.
An error occurred when resetting the password.
Are you sure you want to reset the password for the {0} backup storage?
Are you sure you want to delete the access to the IP block {0}?
Request to delete access to the Backup storage via the {0} IP block has been registered but could take a few minutes
An error occurred when attempting to delete access to the Backup Storage of the {0} IP block
A error occurred on retrieving authorisable blocks
Please select the IP block you wish to authorise and the access options.
You are going to add an access rule to your Backup storage for every IP block on the following list:
You must authorise a protocol as IP blocks without rules will be refused by default.
The request to add access rules to the backup storage has been registered but may take a few minutes
The request to add access rules to the backup storage has been registered but may take a few minutes for some. However, errors occurred for others.
An error occurred when requesting to add access rules to the backup storage
All the available blocks have been authorised
Modification of the {0} access has been registered but may take a few minutes
There was an error when modifying the {0} access
The option to add an additional disk is not available on this range.
You do not have an additional disk.
You will soon be able to add multiple additional disks to your VPS.
How to use an additional disk
Please choose the size of the additional disk for your VPS. It will appear as a second hard drive on your operating system.
The additional disk will be added to your server until your VPS renewal date, it will then be renewed with it.
An error occurred when ordering an additional disk
To finish adding your disk, please settle the purchase order {1}.
An error occurred when loading information on additional disks
There was an error when sending the request to stop showing you information about automatic renewal.
Make your life easier and choose automatic renewal for your VPS! Say goodbye to reminders and unnecessary deletions.
Your VPS has changed universe! You will soon find all of your servers (virtual and dedicated)in one big universe.
